name: movie night cocoon cardi
notes:
a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog [here.][1]

whether you're cozying up on the couch or hitting up the local theater, the movie night cocoon cardi is the perfect addition to your ensemble. like the hug of a blanket, this shrug-style cardigan comfortably drapes over your shoulders for that extra bit of warmth. work it in a lightweight cotton for summer nights or a chunkier wool for cooler temperatures - this same pattern can be used for multiple weights!

shop the full kit [here.][2]

**sizes**
one size

**finished dimensions**
width across back: 40”/1.02m 
length from neck to hem: 40”/1.02m

**difficulty level**
easy

**skills**
double crochet
granny clusters
slip stitch
single crochet
working in the round using the magic loop method

all patterns are written in standard us terms.
